articles.author: Jack Wright
articles.title: Pictured: Seven-stone American pitbull-type dog that mauled boy, 10, to death - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jack Lis, 10, was tragically mauled to death by a 'powerful' and 'aggressive' dog while playing at a friend's house in Caerphilly after school on Monday afternoon, Gwent Police confirmed.
articles.content:
This is the 'aggressive' American pitbull-type dog which mauled a 'sweet' 10-year-old boy to death in Wales

articles.author: Scott Neuman
articles.title: Wilmington marks 123 years since coup and massacre - NPR
articles.description: In 1898, a white supremacist mob burned the offices of Wilmington's Black-owned newspaper and gunned down scores of the city's African American residents. Now, the city is honoring some of the dead.
articles.content: Members of the Grand Lodge of South Carolina carry soil collected in honor of Joshua Halsey to his gravesite at the Pine Forest Cemetery in Wilmington, N.C., on Nov. 6. Great-granddaughters of Halsey… [+6808 chars]

articles.title: Life Without the Vaccine › American Greatness - American Greatness
articles.description: When the vaccine first came out, I wasn’t too eager to get it. I’m young and healthy. Statistics indicated that I was unlikely to get COVID and extremely unlikely to get a serious case of it.

articles.title: General Electric to split into 3 public companies - CTV News
articles.description: General Electric, the storied American manufacturer that struggled under its own weight after growing to become a sprawling conglomerate, will divide itself into three public companies focused on aviation, healthcare and energy.
